connect_account_description: By submitting your details, you agree to share them with {{account_name}}. Your data will be securely stored and processed in compliance with GDPR. View the full {{privacy_policy_link}}.
wait_description: Connecting your account. This may take up to 1 minute. Please do not close or navigate away from this page.
login_error_description: We couldn’t log in. Please check your username and password.
error_message: Something went wrong or there is an issue with your internet connection.
error_instructions: Please try again later, or if the problem continues, take a screenshot of this page and contact support.
data_sharing_description: {{account_display_name}} wants to view your electricity tariff.
data_sharing_policy: Review data protection policy and terms of service to learn how your data is handled.
select_tariff_description: You have multiple contracts in your account. Which tariff/address would you like to connect?
tariff_not_found_description:
We couldn’t retrieve your electricity tariff from your account.

This might be because your electricity is supplied by a different provider.
one_time_code_description: To better secure your account, {{provider_display_name}} sent a one-time code to your email address. Enter this code below. The code is valid for 15 minutes.
